name: Desktop Foosball
description:
DESCRIPTION

Physics based Foosball game. 

---------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

Press "Q", "W" or "E" to select a pole.

Move mouse "UP" or "DOWN" to move the selected pole.

Move mouse "LEFT" or "RIGHT" to rotate the selected pole.

---------------------------------

Please leave feedback or if any bug is found.

Enjoy, have fun.
